edge_1: On April 27, 2017, Universal Pictures and Blumhouse Productions announced a remake of Firestarter (1984).
edge_2: Universal Pictures and Blumhouse Productions announced a remake of Firestarter (1984) on April 27, 2017.

edge_1: On April 27, 2017, Universal Pictures and Blumhouse Productions announced a remake of Firestarter (1984).
edge_2: Akiva Goldsman set to direct and produce Firestarter (1984) remake alongside Jason Blum.

edge_1: On April 27, 2017, Universal Pictures and Blumhouse Productions announced a remake of Firestarter (1984).
edge_2: On June 28, 2018, Fatih Akin replaced Goldsman as director for the Firestarter (1984) remake.

edge_1: On April 27, 2017, Universal Pictures and Blumhouse Productions announced a remake of Firestarter (1984).
edge_2: Scott Teems set to write the script for the Firestarter (1984) remake.

edge_1: On April 27, 2017, Universal Pictures and Blumhouse Productions announced a remake of Firestarter (1984).
edge_2: In December 2019, Keith Thomas replaced Akin as director for the Firestarter (1984) remake.

edge_1: On April 27, 2017, Universal Pictures and Blumhouse Productions announced a remake of Firestarter (1984).
